create or replace PACKAGE lm_han_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table lm_handling_area_stations
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:12)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'LM_HAN_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_HANDLING_AREA_STATIONS';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION han_select_row( i_han_STN_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_han_HAA_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.HAA_ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_han   OUT lm_handling_area_stations%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION han_select_row_upd( i_han_STN_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.STN_ID%TYPE
                           , i_han_HAA_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.HAA_ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_han   OUT lm_handling_area_stations%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE han_lock_row( i_han_STN_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_han_HAA_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.HAA_ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE han_lock_row_nowait( i_han_STN_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.STN_ID%TYPE
 , i_han_HAA_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.HAA_ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE han_insert_row ( io_rt_han  IN OUT lm_handling_area_stations%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION han_update_row( i_han_STN_ID   IN     lm_handling_area_stations.STN_ID%TYPE
                        , i_han_HAA_ID   IN     lm_handling_area_stations.HAA_ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_han  IN OUT lm_handling_area_stations%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION han_delete_row( i_han_STN_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.STN_ID%TYPE
                         , i_han_HAA_ID   IN  lm_handling_area_stations.HAA_ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;


END lm_han_tapi_pck;
/




package body lm_han_tapi_pck
is




function han_select_row( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type
                       , o_rt_han   out lm_handling_area_stations%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_han ( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_handling_area_stations han
            where han.stn_id = i_han_stn_id 
              and han.haa_id = i_han_haa_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_han( i_han_stn_id => i_han_stn_id, i_han_haa_id => i_han_haa_id );
         fetch c_han into o_rt_han;
         l_found := c_han%found;
         close c_han;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_han%isopen
         then
            close c_han;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end han_select_row;

function han_select_row_upd( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
                           , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type
                           , o_rt_han   out lm_handling_area_stations%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_han ( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
                , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_handling_area_stations han
            where han.stn_id = i_han_stn_id 
                and han.haa_id = i_han_haa_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_han( i_han_stn_id => i_han_stn_id
, i_han_haa_id => i_han_haa_id );
   fetch c_han into o_rt_han;
   l_found := c_han%found;
   close c_han;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_han%isopen
      then
         close c_han;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end han_select_row_upd;

procedure han_lock_row( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_han ( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_handling_area_stations han
              where han.stn_id = i_han_stn_id 
                and han.haa_id = i_han_haa_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_han_stn_id is not null
            or i_han_haa_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                han_lock_row_nowait( i_han_stn_id => i_han_stn_id
, i_han_haa_id => i_han_haa_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_han( i_han_stn_id => i_han_stn_id, i_han_haa_id => i_han_haa_id );
                  close c_han;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_han%isopen
         then
            close c_han;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end han_lock_row;

procedure han_lock_row_nowait( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_han ( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_handling_area_stations han
               where han.stn_id = i_han_stn_id 
                 and han.haa_id = i_han_haa_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_han_stn_id is not null
         or i_han_haa_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_han( i_han_stn_id => i_han_stn_id, i_han_haa_id => i_han_haa_id );

            close c_han;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_han%isopen
        then
           close c_han;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'STN_ID = "'||i_han_stn_id||'"'
                                                       ||', HAA_ID = "'||i_han_haa_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end han_lock_row_nowait;

function han_perform_update( i_han_stn_id   in     lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in     lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type
                           , io_rt_han  in out lm_handling_area_stations%rowtype )
return number
;

function han_perform_delete( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure han_insert_row ( io_rt_han  in out lm_handling_area_stations%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_handling_area_stations( stn_id
                                , haa_id
                                , has_id )
              values ( io_rt_han.stn_id
                     , io_rt_han.haa_id
                     , io_rt_han.has_id )
           returning stn_id
                   , haa_id
                   , has_id
                into io_rt_han.stn_id
                   , io_rt_han.haa_id
                   , io_rt_han.has_id;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('STN_ID = "'||io_rt_han.stn_id||'"'
                                                             ||', HAA_ID = "'||io_rt_han.haa_id||'"'
                                                             ||', HAS_ID = "'||io_rt_han.has_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end han_insert_row;

function han_perform_update( i_han_stn_id   in     lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in     lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type
                           , io_rt_han  in out lm_handling_area_stations%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_handling_area_stations
            set stn_id = io_rt_han.stn_id
              , haa_id = io_rt_han.haa_id
              , has_id = io_rt_han.has_id
          where stn_id = i_han_stn_id
            and haa_id = i_han_haa_id
      returning stn_id
              , haa_id
              , has_id
           into io_rt_han.stn_id
              , io_rt_han.haa_id
              , io_rt_han.has_id;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('STN_ID = "'||io_rt_han.stn_id||'"'
                                                             ||', HAA_ID = "'||io_rt_han.haa_id||'"'
                                                             ||', HAS_ID = "'||io_rt_han.has_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end han_perform_update;

function han_perform_delete( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
 , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_handling_area_stations
          where stn_id = i_han_stn_id
            and haa_id = i_han_haa_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'STN_ID = "'||i_han_stn_id||'"'
                                                         ||', HAA_ID = "'||i_han_haa_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end han_perform_delete;

function han_update_row( i_han_stn_id   in     lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
                        , i_han_haa_id   in     lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type
                       , io_rt_han  in out lm_handling_area_stations%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         han_lock_row( i_han_stn_id   =>  i_han_stn_id
 , i_han_haa_id   =>  i_han_haa_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            han_perform_update( i_han_stn_id   =>  i_han_stn_id
 , i_han_haa_id   =>  i_han_haa_id
                              , io_rt_han  => io_rt_han );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('STN_ID = "'||io_rt_han.stn_id||'"'
                                                          ||', HAA_ID = "'||io_rt_han.haa_id||'"'
                                                          ||', HAS_ID = "'||io_rt_han.has_id||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end han_update_row;

function han_delete_row( i_han_stn_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.stn_id%type
                         , i_han_haa_id   in  lm_handling_area_stations.haa_id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.han_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         han_lock_row( i_han_stn_id   =>  i_han_stn_id
          , i_han_haa_id   =>  i_han_haa_id );

         
         l_deleted := han_perform_delete( i_han_stn_id   =>  i_han_stn_id
 , i_han_haa_id   =>  i_han_haa_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'STN_ID = "'||i_han_stn_id||'"'
                                                      ||', HAA_ID = "'||i_han_haa_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end han_delete_row;


end lm_han_tapi_pck;
/
